title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba -To the Hashira Training-
overview: A recap of Kimetsu no Yaiba episodes 55â€“56, with new footage and special end credits. Tanjiro undergoes rigorous training with the Stone Hashira, Himejima, in his quest to become a Hashira. Meanwhile, Muzan continues to search for Nezuko and Ubuyashiki.
